Cell.Data: This contains original text meant for subtitles. Use descriptive expressions like <frantic laughter> and ## for a new line.
This contains text for subtitles. Use descriptive expressions like <frantic laughter> and ## for a new line.
The World of Umbra will stand, whatever the cost.
Go back in to to get your reward !
Throws a fire ball spreading flames and setting your enemies on fire.
Steals your enemy's soul, thus empowering your equipement.
A violent melee attack that might stun and eject enemies.
Plants an Umbral bomb on the ground that explodes after a short time.
An explosion of ice which freezes all enemies nearby.
Shoots powerful thunderbolts at close enemies.
Reduces ressource costs and refresh time. More to come - work in progress
Increase the effective power of the skill.
Perform a basic attack with the equipped weapon.
Continuously shoot jolts of lightning from your hands to shock all enemies in an arc in front of you. Doesn't cost any Umbra.
Strikes a group of enemies by teleporting on them. May stun them on landing.
A line of explosions that blasts all enemies in front of you.
Turns your body into a shadow, preventing potential damage and striking enemies nearby.
Freezes and snares all enemies around you.
Throws a slow but powerful exploding projectile.
Throws a fire ball spreading flames and setting your enemies on fire.
Throws several fireballs in front of you, growing in number as you cast them.
Performs a slow swing that repels and knocks your enemies down.
Conjure a blizzard that damages and snares all enemies in the target area.
Casts a powerful Meteor from the sky which may stun hit enemies.
Shoots multiple magic rays at nearby enemies. Need at least one valid target to be cast successfully.
Casts a single lightning bolt which can bounce from one enemy to another.
Summons fire projectiles to fall down on enemies in the area.
Shoots several lightning projectiles all around you.
Shapes you into a moving pool of blood, preventing potential damage and draining health from enemies.
Confuses nearby enemies and makes them attack each other.
Brutally slams the ground, stunning all enemies nearby.
Shouts a powerful roar that generates rage and increases your movement speed and base damage.
Increases your attack speed for each strike.
Summons a rock shield that may block incoming attacks.
Summons a magical shield that absorbs a limited amount of damage and repels incoming projectiles.
Increases the Umbra cost of your spells, but regenerates it much faster.
Performs a two handed combo with your shield and weapon.
Performs a swift melee combo with your weapon. Deals increased weapon damage.
Performs numerous attacks with both your weapons. Deals reduced damage per hit.
Performs a swift assault with your daggers.
Performs slow and wide-ranged thrusts with your weapon.
Performs very slow but powerful attacks with your weapon.
Performs wide-ranged attacks with your weapon.
A wide slash that hits multiple targets and makes them bleed over time, dealing damage depending on your stacks of Hemorrhage.
A charged attack that inflicts severe damage and may knock your enemies down.
A double charged attack that inflicts severe damage and always does a critical strike.
A powerful charged attack that hits enemies in front of you.
A charged forward attack that pierces through enemies.
Greatly increases your armor, but increases the Umbra cost of your spells and your natural Rage loss.
Blocks all frontal attacks, preventing part of incoming damage.
Gives fire damage to your shots, inflicting burning damage over time. Permanent effect when toggled on.
Gives frost damage and a chance to freeze enemies to your shots. Permanent effect when toggled on.
Gives lightning damage and a chance to stun enemies to your shots. Permanent effect when toggled on.
Your shots become explosives, hitting enemies in a radius. Permanent effect when toggled on.
Knock-back your enemies and deals increased damage to frozen entities. Permanent effect when toggled on.
Gives poison damage to your shots. Combine with Explosive ammunition to create a poison cloud. Permanent effect when toggled on.
Triggers an open wound on enemies. Permanent effect when toggled on.
A concentrated shot that pierces through enemies.
Quickly shoots several aligned projectiles with your weapon.
You shoot multiple bolts with your weapon.
Forcefully swing your weapon in a circular motion, striking all enemies around you while moving. Continuously depletes your Rage.
Raises a stone wall in front of you.
You can equip a potion here
Find the river close to Amarth
Find Ferns close to the river
Your wounds have been healed, but Forces of Evil had time to regroupâ¦
You can't equip an item while using a skill.
You can't use a town portal here.
You need to stand near a Waypoint to teleport.
Average number of attack per second
Chance to deal a Critical Attack with melee and ranged weapons
Increases ranged physical damage, movement and attack speed and dodge rating.
Increases your Umbra pool and the efficiency of magical skills
Fire Damage dealt by your melee and ranged attacks
Frost Damage dealt by your melee and ranged attacks
Lightning Damage dealt by your melee and ranged attacks
Umbra Damage dealth by your melee and ranged attacks
Aggravated Damage dealt by your melee and ranged attacks
Chance to find better Magic Items
Increase the amount of gold found on enemies
Damage received are reduced by this percentage
Maximum pool for Life Leech effect
Time bonus for all offensive effects (freeze, burn, stun knock down ectâ¦)
